name: Srategic Defense
description:
A real-time War-Strategy simulation.
*Made with the free edition of coppercube

Watch the World from afar and intercept radio broadcasts to prevent missile strikes.
With elements from "Risk", "Populous" and "Missile Command".

Features:
Zoom Camera
3D Earth model
Moving Sun lighting (normal mapped)
Fighter Plane
Bomber Plane
Spy Plane
Satellite
Ham Radio Broadcast
Flags of the World (disabled)
Voices (Disabled)

Controls:
Mouse Move/Zoom camera

Gameplay:
All you can do at the moment is look for the 3 planes and a satellite.
